channel.title: Pure Diary + 1st PK :)
channel.description:
A few weeks ago i decided to make a pure ranger, i've been on and off it for a while because i had other accounts to train. But last week my Main account was stolen, so i've decided to "Pimp" My pure :).
RSN. il-wh0-il. Add me if you want to talk, but don't add me if your just going to beg.
I started Yesterday, 22nd July.
I started from 40 range, i just trained in edge on guards and Skeletons, i made a few new friends while training, and i got to 43 range in about an hour. Then i decided to buy membership, and from there i have been training on rock crabs, and when they are too busy, i go train on Barbarians. I didn't really have much time yesterday, so i didn't play that much.
23rd July
Today i've been training on Barbarians for about an Hour, and now 47 range. I bought some gear, like arrows, obby cape and a glory, and i am planning on getting Elegant.
24th July
Today i got back to rock crabs, got to 52 range after being on an hour, then got bored and decided to pk. I didn't get any decent loot, but if i do i'll screenie the pile. Not been on long today, been busy.
31st July.
I have been busy, and havn't been able to update this post, i am now 60 range! :o Thats the main thing i've been doing, rock crabbing :).
Current Look. [img]http://img260.imageshack.us/img260/3405/mylooksf5.png[/img]
Current Stats. [img]http://img255.imageshack.us/img255/1528/statsdk9.png[/img] Notice now, i am 71 fletching :).
[img]http://i76.photobucket.com/albums/j27/fistfighta/woot.jpg?t=1185291408[/img]
Goals..
[ul][li][s]50 range[/s][/li] [li][s]60 range[/s][/li] [li]70 range[/li] [li]60 mage[/li] [li][b]Get Ranger Set[/b][/li][/ul] ([i]Half Done[/i])
[ul][li]Get Skills up. 50 fish + Cook. 70+ Fletch. 60+ WC.[/li] [li][i] Might get 40 def, not sure yet..[/i][/li][/ul]
Current Bank Pic. [img]http://img208.imageshack.us/img208/4482/bankgg0.png[/img]
First Decent PK. (Sorry no pile pic, Pjers were around :\) [img]http://i76.photobucket.com/albums/j27/fistfighta/Loot1.jpg?t=1185301543[/img]
I am don't believe in honor pking, although, i don't PJ in edge, or tele, but in varrok, i am no honor.
Donations...
Arrows, Knives, and a Bob Shirt. <3 To Him.
[img]http://i76.photobucket.com/albums/j27/fistfighta/lobbies.jpg?t=1185303584[/img]
If you really want to know my username, PM me :).
[B] Achived 50 range, Got a another donation, Arrows, and a blue Beret.. Happy Days ^^.[/b]

item.title: Pure Diary + 1st PK :)
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

The whip will jump in prices just like Robin hat and ranger boots did(set use to be 3.5-4m, no its over 6m) Whip is 1.4-1.6 right now, it will be over 3m in 1-3months. Everything is doing this, the more common the item is, the more people are raising the price(Economy is fucked right now).

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:16, topic:126352”][quote author=Kaza link=topic=176582.msg1641552#msg1641552 date=1185924002]
I don’t know why it dropped, when i got my first ever whip, it was 2.3m… But i will sell it if i find i ncie price :).
[/quote]

I think items like the whip generally decrease in price according to an inverse curve.[/quote]
Where do you get your facts…?

Read full topic
